characterInfo.Title(s): Cultivation, Mother of the World, She Who Brings the Dews at Dawn
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance (mentioned),  Edgedancer (mentioned),  Oathbringer (mentioned),  Rhythm of War (mentioned)

characterDescription: Koravellium Avast - also known as Koravari and She Who Brings the Dews at Dawn - was the original Shardholder (or Vessel) of Cultivation, who held her for 7000 years and does still.

characterDetails.Appearance: Typically, when appearing before humans, she seems to be a mature dark-skinned woman who has a round face and a head of tightly-curling black hair. She wears a brown dress that seems to be fused with the undergrowth of her environs.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
She prefers to hide her true form, even when speaking with other Shards.
Her voice is described as sounding like the tumbling of stones.
characterDetails.Notes: Hoid is the one who calls her Slammer.
